title: DO-06-023: Ethics and Working with Contractors — Questions and Answers
summary:
Guidance on variety of ethics issues that commonly arise in procurement context, such as seeking employment, post-employment, financial conflicts of interest, outside employment, gifts and misuse of office.  

Notes: [Notes: (1) The guidance in Question 3 of this DAEOgram has been modified in light of STOCK Act notification requirements. (2) Changes to the Standards of Conduct effective August 15, 2024 have modified certain elements of the discussion in this DAEOgram relating to the 2635.502 “catch-all,” 2635.503 provisions on payments from former employers, and 2635.808 solicitation restrictions.]
